trans-unit.source: about_Group_Policy_Settings
trans-unit.target: about_Group_Policy_Settings

trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: About Group Policy Settings
trans-unit.target: 有关组策略设置

trans-unit.source: about_Group_Policy_Settings
trans-unit.target: about_Group_Policy_Settings

trans-unit.source: TOPIC
trans-unit.target: TOPIC

trans-unit.source: about_Group_Policy_Settings
trans-unit.target: about_Group_Policy_Settings

trans-unit.source: SHORT DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 简短说明

trans-unit.source: Describes the Group Policy settings for Windows PowerShell
trans-unit.target: 介绍 Windows PowerShell 的组策略设置

trans-unit.source: LONG DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 详细说明

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell includes Group Policy settings to help you define consistent option values for servers in an enterprise environment.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 包括组策略设置，以帮助您在企业环境中定义的服务器保持一致的选项值。

trans-unit.source: The Windows PowerShell Group Policy settings are in the following Group Policy paths:
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 组策略设置位于下列组策略路径中︰

trans-unit.source: Computer Configuration\Administrative Templates\Windows Components\Windows PowerShell User Configuration\Administrative Templates\Windows Components\Windows PowerShell
trans-unit.target: 计算机配置 \ 管理模板 \windows 组件 \windows PowerShell 用户配置 \ 管理模板 \windows 组件 \windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: Group policy settings in the User Configuration path take precedence over Group Policy settings in the Computer Configuration path.
trans-unit.target: 用户配置路径中的组策略设置优先于在计算机配置路径中的组策略设置。

trans-unit.source: The policies are as follows:
trans-unit.target: 策略如下所示︰

trans-unit.source: Turn on Script Execution: Sets the Windows PowerShell execution policy.
trans-unit.target: 启用脚本执行︰ 设置 Windows PowerShell 执行策略。

trans-unit.source: Turn on Module Logging: Sets the LogPipelineExecutionDetails property of modules.
trans-unit.target: 打开模块日志记录︰ 将模块的 LogPipelineExecutionDetails 属性设置。

trans-unit.source: Set the default source path for Update-Help: Sets the source for UpdatableHelp to a directory, not the Internet.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Update-help 的默认源路径︰ 将源 UpdatableHelp 设为一个目录，而不是 Internet。

trans-unit.source: To download spreadsheets that list all of the Group Policy settings for each version of Windows, see "Group Policy Settings Reference for Windows and Windows Server" in the Microsoft Download Center at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=261775
trans-unit.target: 若要下载电子表格，其中列出的所有组策略设置为每个版本的 Windows，请参阅"组策略设置引用的 Windows 和 Windows Server"中在 http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=261775 从 Microsoft 下载中心获得

trans-unit.source: TURN ON SCRIPT EXECUTION
trans-unit.target: TURN ON SCRIPT EXECUTION

trans-unit.source: The "Turn on Script Execution" policy setting sets the execution policy for computers and users, which determines which scripts are permitted to run.
trans-unit.target: "启用脚本执行"策略设置设置执行策略为计算机和用户，它确定哪些脚本有权运行。

trans-unit.source: If you enable the policy setting, you can select from among the following policy settings.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用策略设置，您可以选择从以下策略设置。

trans-unit.source: -- "Allow only signed scripts" allows scripts to execute only if they are signed by a trusted publisher.
trans-unit.target: -"允许仅签名的脚本"允许脚本执行仅当由受信任的发行者进行了签名。

trans-unit.source: This policy setting is equivalent to the AllSigned execution policy.
trans-unit.target: 此策略设置等效于 AllSigned 执行策略。

trans-unit.source: -- "Allow local scripts and remote signed scripts" allows all local scripts to run.
trans-unit.target: -"允许本地脚本和远程签名的脚本"允许运行所有本地脚本。

trans-unit.source: Scripts that originate from the Internet must be signed by a trusted publisher.
trans-unit.target: 必须由受信任的发行者签名源自 Internet 的脚本。

trans-unit.source: This policy setting is equivalent to the RemoteSigned execution policy.
trans-unit.target: 此策略设置等效于 RemoteSigned 执行策略。

trans-unit.source: -- "Allow all scripts" allows all scripts to run.
trans-unit.target: -"允许所有脚本"允许运行所有脚本。

trans-unit.source: This policy setting is equivalent to the Unrestricted execution policy.
trans-unit.target: 此策略设置等效于不受限制的执行策略。

trans-unit.source: If you disable this policy setting, no scripts are allowed to run.
trans-unit.target: 如果禁用此策略设置，则不允许任何脚本运行。

trans-unit.source: This policy setting is equivalent to the Restricted execution policy.
trans-unit.target: 此策略设置相当于受限制的执行策略。

trans-unit.source: If you disable or do not configure this policy setting, the execution policy that is set for the computer or user by the Set-ExecutionPolicy cmdlet determines whether scripts are permitted to run.
trans-unit.target: 如果禁用或未配置此策略设置，Set-executionpolicy cmdlet 为计算机或用户设置的执行策略确定是否允许脚本运行。

trans-unit.source: The default value is Restricted.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是受限制。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Execution_Policies (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=135170).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_Execution_Policies (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=135170)。

trans-unit.source: TURN ON MODULE LOGGING
trans-unit.target: 打开模块日志记录

trans-unit.source: The "Turn on Module Logging" policy setting turns on logging for selected Windows PowerShell modules.
trans-unit.target: "打开模块日志记录"策略设置启用选定的 Windows PowerShell 模块的日志记录。

trans-unit.source: The setting is effective in all sessions on all affected computers.
trans-unit.target: 设置为在所有受影响的计算机上的所有会话中有效。

trans-unit.source: If you enable this policy setting and specify one or more modules, pipeline execution events for the specified modules are recorded in the Windows PowerShell log in Event Viewer.
trans-unit.target: 如果您启用此策略设置，并指定一个或多个模块，为指定的模块的管道执行事件将记录在事件查看器中的 Windows PowerShell 日志中。

trans-unit.source: If you disable this policy setting, logging of execution events is disabled for all Windows PowerShell modules.
trans-unit.target: 如果禁用此策略设置，请执行事件的日志记录会禁用所有 Windows PowerShell 模块。

trans-unit.source: If this policy setting is not configured, the LogPipelineExecutionDetails property of each module or snap-in determines whether the execution events of a module or snap-in are logged.
trans-unit.target: 如果未配置此策略设置，每个模块或管理单元的 LogPipelineExecutionDetails 属性确定是否记录模块或管理单元中的执行事件。

trans-unit.source: By default, the LogPipelineExecutionDetails property of all modules and snap-ins is set to False.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，所有的模块和管理单元的 LogPipelineExecutionDetails 属性设置为 False。

trans-unit.source: To turn on module logging for a module, use the following command format.
trans-unit.target: 若要打开模块日志记录模块，请使用以下命令格式。

trans-unit.source: The module must be imported into the session and the setting is effective only in the current session.
trans-unit.target: 该模块必须导入到会话，并且设置为仅在当前会话中有效。

trans-unit.source: PS C:>Import-Module <Module-Name> PS C:>(Get-Module <Module-Name>).LogPipelineExecutionDetails = $true
trans-unit.target: PS c: > 导入模块 < 模块名称 > PS c: > (Get-module < 模块名称 >)。LogPipelineExecutionDetails = $true

trans-unit.source: To turn on module logging for all sessions on a particular computer, add the previous commands to the all-users Windows PowerShell profile ($Profile.AllUsers.AllHosts).
trans-unit.target: 若要打开模块日志记录的特定计算机上的所有会话，将添加到所有用户的 Windows PowerShell 配置文件 ($Profile.AllUsers.AllHosts) 的以前的命令。

trans-unit.source: For more information about module logging, see about_Modules (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144311).
trans-unit.target: 有关模块日志记录的详细信息，请参阅 about_Modules (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144311)。

trans-unit.source: SET THE DEFAULT SOURCE PATH FOR UPDATE-HELP
trans-unit.target: 设置默认源路径 FOR 更新的帮助

trans-unit.source: The "Set the Default Source Path for Update-Help" policy setting sets a default value for the SourcePath parameter of the Update-Help cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: "设置默认源路径为 Update-help"策略设置设置 Update-help cmdlet 的 SourcePath 参数的默认值。

trans-unit.source: This setting prevents users from using the Update-Help cmdlet to download help files from the Internet.
trans-unit.target: 此设置可防止用户使用 Update-help cmdlet 来从 Internet 下载帮助文件。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: The "Set the default source path for Update-Help" Group Policy setting appears under Computer Configuration and User Configuration.
trans-unit.target: 注意:"设置 Update-help 的默认源路径"组策略设置出现在计算机配置和用户配置下。

trans-unit.source: However, only the Group Policy setting under Computer Configuration is effective.
trans-unit.target: 但是，仅在计算机配置下的组策略设置是有效的。

trans-unit.source: The Group Policy setting under User Configuration is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在用户配置下的组策略设置将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The Update-Help cmdlet downloads and installs the newest help files for Windows PowerShell modules and installs them on the computer.
trans-unit.target: Update-help cmdlet 下载和安装 Windows PowerShell 模块的最新帮助文件并将其安装在计算机上。

trans-unit.source: By default, Update-Help downloads new help files from an Internet location specified by the module.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Update-help 将从指定的模块的 Internet 位置下载新的帮助文件。

trans-unit.source: However, you can use the Save-Help cmdlet to download the newest help files to a file system location, such as a network share, and then use the Update-Help cmdlet to get the help files from the file system location and install them on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 但是，您可以使用 Save-help cmdlet 到文件系统位置，如网络共享上，下载最新帮助文件，然后使用 Update-help cmdlet 从文件系统位置获取帮助文件并将其安装在计算机上。

trans-unit.source: The SourcePath parameter of the Update-Help cmdlet specifies the file system location.
trans-unit.target: Update-help cmdlet 的 SourcePath 参数指定的文件系统位置。

trans-unit.source: By providing a default value for the SourcePath parameter, this Group Policy setting implicitly adds the SourcePath parameter to all Update-Help commands.
trans-unit.target: 通过为 SourcePath 参数提供默认值，此组策略设置隐式将 SourcePath 参数添加到所有 Update-help 命令。

trans-unit.source: Users can override the particular file system location specified as the default value by entering a different file system location.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以重写通过输入不同的文件系统位置指定为默认值的特定文件系统位置。

trans-unit.source: But they cannot remove the SourcePath parameter from the Update-Help command.
trans-unit.target: 但他们无法从 Update-help 命令删除 SourcePath 参数。

trans-unit.source: If you enable this policy setting, you can specify a default value for the SourcePath parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用此策略设置，可以指定 SourcePath 参数的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Enter a file system location.
trans-unit.target: 输入文件系统位置。

trans-unit.source: If this policy setting is disabled or not configured, there is no default value for the SourcePath parameter of the Update-Help cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 如果禁用或未配置此策略设置，则 Update-help cmdlet 的 SourcePath 参数没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: Users can download help from the Internet or from any file system location.
trans-unit.target: 从 Internet 或从任何文件系统位置，用户可以下载帮助。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Updatable_Help (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=235801).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_Updatable_Help (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=235801)。

trans-unit.source: KEYWORDS
trans-unit.target: 关键字

trans-unit.source: about_Group_Policies about_GroupPolicy
trans-unit.target: about_Group_Policies about_GroupPolicy

trans-unit.target: 另请参阅

trans-unit.target: about_Execution_Policies about_Modules about_Updatable_Help

trans-unit.source: Get-ExecutionPolicy Set-ExecutionPolicy Get-Module Update-Help Save-Help
trans-unit.target: Get-executionpolicy 集-ExecutionPolicy Get 模块更新帮助保存的帮助。
